short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension that makes women-centric data available at a click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ActiveRank is an innovative ranking system to make shoppers more aware of how women-friendly the companies they shop at are, as well as see a breakdown of pay gaps, benefits, and more.
Make your voice heard when you shop online! Use ActiveRank to purchase the products you love from companies that advance women at work and beyond.

ActiveRank works best on Chrome. 

INSTRUCTIONS: 
After downloading, a button with the ActiveRank logo should pop up on the top right hand side. When you're browsing on a page, click on that button, and wait for a few seconds for the ranking and breakdowns to load.
